dcterms:description: A toy dataset of sentences generated from a context-free grammar (CFG) with a large vocabulary and numerous grammar rules, designed to evaluate the language learned and generated by models. It includes biased sentences selected according to an adjacency matrix of words that can occur together, and unbiased sentences sampled from the CFG.
dcterms:title: Toy Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. De Vries
F. Strub
S. Chandar
O. Pietquin
H. Larochelle
A. C. Courville
dcterms:description: The GuessWhat?! dataset consists of sentences asked by humans to humans to solve a cooperative game, featuring a large vocabulary and a variety of sentence structures.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat?! Dataset
